attributes.action: Put up emergency legislation to ensure the bosses at LOCOG 2012 cannot use taxpayers funding to pay themselves HUGE bonuses.
attributes.additional_details: With the governments propensity towards giving chief executives of all publicly funded organisations carte blanche over the level of bonuses regardless how much they have received as a salary for properly doing the job they were contracted to undertake - and how much more of a bonus they get if they fail to do that job properly (ergo G4S still getting its management allowance of GBP57million of taxpayer pounds despite failing to fulfil its contract with the taxpayer - we must take care that the bosses at LOCOG 2012 should not be allowed to pay themselves bonuses at the expense of the taxpayer.
